field.description: This wizard will guide you through the initial system configuration. The wizard may be stopped at any time by clicking the logo image at the top of the screen.

step.title: Time Server Information

field.name: Time server hostname
field.description: Enter the hostname (FQDN) of the time server.

step.title: Configure WAN Interface

field.name: MAC Address
field.description: This field can be used to modify ("spoof") the MAC address of the WAN interface (may be required with some cable connections). Enter a MAC address in the following format: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or leave blank.

field.name: MTU
field.description: Set the MTU of the WAN interface. If you leave this field blank, an MTU of 1492 bytes for PPPoE and 1500 bytes for all other connection types will be assumed.

field.name: MSS
field.description: If you enter a value in this field, then MSS clamping for TCP connections to the value entered above minus 40 (TCP/IP header size) will be in effect. If you leave this field blank, an MSS of 1492 bytes for PPPoE and 1500 bytes for all other connection types will be assumed. This should match the above MTU value in most all cases.

field.name: Upstream Gateway
field.message: Gateway IP Address field is invalid

field.name: DHCP Hostname
field.description: The value in this field is sent as the DHCP client identifier and hostname when requesting a DHCP lease. Some ISPs may require this (for client identification).

field.name: PPPoE Dial on demand
field.description: This option causes the interface to operate in dial-on-demand mode, allowing you to have a virtual full time connection. The interface is configured, but the actual connection of the link is delayed until qualifying outgoing traffic is detected.

field.name: PPPoE Idle timeout
field.description: If no qualifying outgoing packets are transmitted for the specified number of seconds, the connection is brought down. An idle timeout of zero disables this feature.

field.name: PPTP Local IP Address
field.message: PPTP Local IP Address field is invalid

field.name: PPTP Remote IP Address
field.message: PPTP Remote IP Address field is invalid

field.name: PPTP Dial on demand
field.description: This option causes the interface to operate in dial-on-demand mode, allowing you to have a virtual full time connection. The interface is configured, but the actual connection of the link is delayed until qualifying outgoing traffic is detected.

field.name: PPTP Idle timeout
field.description: If no qualifying outgoing packets are transmitted for the specified number of seconds, the connection is brought down. An idle timeout of zero disables this feature.

field.name: Block RFC1918 Private Networks
field.description: When set, this option blocks traffic from IP addresses that are reserved for private networks as per RFC 1918 (10/8, 172.16/12, 192.168/16) as well as loopback addresses (127/8) and Carrier-grade NAT addresses (100.64/10). This option should only be set for WAN interfaces that use the public IP address space.
field.typehint: Block private networks from entering via WAN

field.name: Block bogon networks
field.description: When set, this option blocks traffic from IP addresses that are reserved (but not RFC 1918) or not yet assigned by IANA.
field.typehint: Block non-Internet routed networks from entering via WAN
